rule.name: VIM_OverviewDashboard
rule.definition: { #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_columnsLayout"( columns: { #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_columnLayout"( contents: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_columnChartField"( label: "Returned Sales", categories: { "Jan", "Feb", ) ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_columnLayout"( contents: = #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_pieChartField"( label: "Sales By Incentive", instructions: "", series: { #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_chartSeries"( label: "July Sales", data: 2 ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_chartSeries"( label: "Christmas Deal", data: 12 ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_chartSeries"( label: "Inbound Sale", data: 4 ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_chartSeries"( label: "Referral Incentive", data: 7 ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_chartSeries"( label: "Tradeshow Only", data: 8 ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_chartSeries"( label: "Spring Bash", data: 6 ) }, showDataLabels: true ) ) } ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_columnsLayout"( columns: { #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_columnLayout"( contents: = #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_lineChartField"( label: "Monthly Sale Trends By Type", categories: { "Mar", "Apr", "May", "Jun", "Jul", "Aug", "Sep", "Oct", "Nov", "Dec", "Jan", "Feb" }, series: { #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_chartSeries"( label: "Sport", data: { 92, 94, 93, 95, 96, 99, 98, 100, 99, 91, 98, 99 } ),
